name: Comprehensive Workflow Test
description: Test workflow to validate all workflow manager functionality including corner-based template matching
author: Application Manager Bot System

objectives.name: Application Startup Sequence
objectives.description: Execute the complete startup sequence - opens, maximizes, and verifies the application

objectives.name: Initial Stability Wait
objectives.description: Wait 2 seconds to ensure application is stable after startup

objectives.name: Visual Verification Check
objectives.description: Perform corner-based visual verification to confirm application is properly displayed

objectives.name: Ensure Application is Open
objectives.description: Verify the application process is running (redundant check for testing)

objectives.name: Force Window Maximization
objectives.description: Explicitly maximize the window to test corner template detection

objectives.name: Bring to Foreground
objectives.description: Ensure the application window has focus and is in the foreground

objectives.name: Quick Stability Check
objectives.description: Brief wait to ensure window state changes are complete

objectives.name: Final Visual Verification
objectives.description: Final check to confirm all corner templates are detected

objectives.name: Custom Action Test
objectives.description: Test unsupported objective type to verify error handling

objectives.name: File Operation Test
objectives.description: Another unsupported objective to test workflow resilience

objectives.name: Network Request Test
objectives.description: Simulated network operation (unsupported) to test error handling

objectives.name: Final Wait
objectives.description: Final wait period to observe the completed state
